channel.title: Female weapon weilding issue
channel.description:
All weapons and shields are wielded to high, I figure this isn't a model error since its consistent with all weapons and shields, I tried to find a fix but tbh I'm not even sure what to look for, any advise or help would be greatly appreciated.
[img]http://i10.servimg.com/u/f10/17/98/16/40/screen10.png[/img]

item.title: Female weapon weilding issue
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

I saw somewhat of a fix for this on Runeee-Serberrr. But, your item revision might be too high for your character models. Jagex seems to make the characters slightly bigger whenever they upgrade them.

Read full topic
